text:
[Verse]
Feet on the cold ground
Raindrops falling down
Splash in puddles bright
Laughter feels so right

[Verse 2]
Umbrella's out of sight
We dance through the night
Clothes soaking through
Nothing else to do

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Let go of the pain
Free like the wind
Let’s do it again

[Verse 3]
Clouds up high in grey
Light up this dark day
Water everywhere
We dance without care

[Verse 4]
Hold my hand tight
Twirl in the moonlight
Spin until we're dizzy
Life can be so easy

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Let go of the pain
Free like the wind
Let’s do it again
title: Dancing in the Rain
